titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the O.C. Scudder photographs 1910-1945
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by CPNWS staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2012
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

did.abstract: The O.C. Scudder photographs document people, scenes and structures throughout the Bellingham area and Washington State. Subjects include construction of the Mt. Baker Theatre, Chuckanut Drive, Deception Pass, North Cascades wilderness areas, the Northern Grocery Company building, and various private residences.

scopecontent.p: The O.C. Scudder photographs document people, scenes and structures throughout the Bellingham area and Washington State. Subjects include construction of the Mt. Baker theater, Chuckanut Drive, Deception Pass, North Cascades wilderness areas, the Northern Grocery Company building, and various private residences.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: O.C. Scudder photographs, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
processinfo.p: To learn more about problematic content in our collections, collection description and teaching tools (including how to provide feedback or request dialogue on this topic), see the following Statement About Potentially Harmful Language and Content

acqinfo.p: Donated by the Scudder family, date unknown.

otherfindaid.p: To view item level descriptions of images in the O.C. Scudder photographs, follow this hyperlink to the photo database on the Center for Pacific Northwest Studies' website.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.geogname: Deception Pass (Island County and Skagit County, Wash.)--Photographs.
